description: NewsSphere is a dynamic platform that aggregates trending news and in-depth articles across various categories. The platform offers both free and premium experiences, complete with real-time data updates, secure subscription management, and a responsive design for an optimal user experience on any device.
features: Tailored user experience with Normal and Premium user roles
Diverse news categories including Technology, Business, Health, Science, Sports, and Politics
Robust article management for admins to create, update, and delete content
Smart search and filtering capabilities for easy news discovery
Responsive design optimized for desktops, tablets, and mobile devices
Seamless image uploads using the ImgBB API
Real-time data synchronization with TanStack Query
Secure subscription system powered by Stripe for premium content access
Effortless tag and publisher management for organized content
Interactive notifications using SweetAlert2 for an enhanced user experience

description: A web application designed to connect people who have lost items with those who have found them. It enables users to post details about lost and found items, fostering a community-driven approach to recovering lost possessions.
features: Secure login and registration with Firebase Authentication
Post Lost & Found Items with detailed information
Real-time updates for marking items as 'Recovered'
Dynamic Routes powered by React Router
Responsive Design using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI
Interactive animations with Framer Motion
Date selection using react-datepicker
Social Media Sharing
User Profile Management
Success toasts using Sweetalert2

description: A web application designed to connect individuals who want to raise money for personal needs, creative ideas, or startups with potential contributors. It enables users to create and manage fundraising campaigns, make donations, and track project progress.
features: Secure sign-up, login, and profile management
Create, view, update, and delete fundraising campaigns
Contribute to campaigns and view donation history
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Ensures data privacy and safety

description: This website connects donors with volunteers to provide winter clothing for people in need across Bangladesh. It allows users to donate clothing, volunteer for distribution, and stay updated on donation campaigns.
features: Firebase Authentication for secure login and registration
JSON-based donation campaigns with campaign details
Private Routes for secured access to donation details and dashboard
Real-time donation form validation with toast confirmation
Dynamic Navbar with options based on user authentication
User profile management with update options
Smooth animations using AOS
Responsive winter-themed layout
404 error page with navigation to home
Social media sharing links

description: A modern e-commerce platform for showcasing and purchasing the latest gadgets. This project offers features for exploring products, adding items to the cart or favorites, and staying updated on tech trends and glossary information.
features: Product listing and filtering
Detailed product view with specifications and user ratings
Add to Cart and Favorites with local storage support
Responsive design optimized for all devices
Tech Glossary & Trends pages for user engagement
